item.title: Can you make slides with Inkscape? Yes you can!
item.description: This is a blog post I made on my old blog back in 2016. To be completely honest, I am not using Inkscape to make presentations anymore, mostly because I did not like using the app on a Mac in the first place. Nevertheless, maybe somebody still finds this interesting! Besides death and taxes, there is another thing that is pretty sure in life: you will have to present stuff. This is especially true in the academic world.
